welcome: Welcome to the Traffic Congestion application manual.
syncDesc: The 'Synchronize 2018 Data' button connects to the SP City Hall API and downloads all 161,000+ congestion records to the local database (lentidao_2018.db). Use this function the first time you open the app. The progress bar will show the status.
filterDesc: The filter area allows you to search the local database. After setting your filters, click 'Search'. The table will update with the results (limited to 500 per search).
filterExpressa: Expressway: Filter by road type (A, E, or Empty).
crudDesc: You can manage local records directly in the table:
crudEdit: Edit Selected: Click an item in the table, then this button. A new window will open allowing you to edit the data. Click 'Save' to confirm.
crudDelete: Delete Selected: Click an item, then this button. A confirmation will be required before permanently deleting the record from the local database.
